milanga parlimenthu raswimata pera wipaksha nayaka dhuraya sambandhayen thiranayak labadena lesa mahajana eksath peramune nayaka parlimenthu manthri  dinesh gunawardhana, kathanayaka chamal rajapakshagen illimak kala.
ratawal 54 ka shakha 175 ka niyojanayak athi podu rajya mandaliya parlimenthu sangamaye sasiwara dekak 1975 wasare di saha 1995 wasare di merata di pawathwa thibe.

api hari lokuwata nuthana thakshanaya ekakka ganudenu karanawa arak karanawa meka karanawa kiyala ape godak madhya berihan dunnata me wage wadakata nathi dewal walata dena pracharaya dakkama mata penne asuchi godawal lewakanna ee ayage thiyena aasawa th gal yugaye manasikathwayath pamanayi.koti gananin wancha karana allasa dushanaya wapurana ayage namawath kiyannata bayawena nam ahena kota redda palle malapahawena janamadyayata me wage samajayen balahathkarayen kon karana lada kanthawakage pudgalika jiwithaye adu padu hoyanna idiripathwenna kisima lajjawak na.oya widiyata mahansi wela rate inna wancha karayo, sthri dushakayo komis kakko gana liwwanan mita godak kalekata kalin aper rata aththatam lokaye aashcharyaya bawata pathkaraganna thibuna...koheda ithin...
